name: Tongues Wag
description:
"...
I'm getting better everyday
I just don't care what they say
People are talking, they were talking before
They don't even know who we are anymore
I never wanted to be looking back
I need to find, some peace of mind gimme peace of mind
..."

Lyrics from dEUS - Dream Sequence #1 (from the album "The Ideal Crash")

-------------


The fourth drop of the "extreme doodling" series.

A fifth and closing one will be minted and airdroped in the wallet of those who will buy the 4 firsts of this series.

("Monikon Partitiivi", "Stomp", "Hyperesthesia" & this one,"Tongues Wag")


A freehand drawing, still grotesque, toony and nightmarish, as life can be. 

Black pen on white paper.
